author: ebrondol
body:
In this PR, I just merged 4 files created by @ghugo83 and they partly fix the path to pick up the correct material in tracking for phase2. @ianna please confirm it.
This is a work which is evolving now in order to produce a good tracking for phase2, so another PR will follow soon to fix the values of the Xi in the Outer Tracker and there we expect the real step in a good direction. In this moment, some changes are expected for phase2 reco, but the real analysis should be done after the second PR, @VinInn can also comment in case of performance changes.
No changes are expected for other phases. 

@rovere @kpedro88 @boudoul
title: Updating xmls Material Budget for Phase2 reco
